tool_description: Analyzes industry-specific risk factors and market conditions to provide risk assessments for businesses operating in specific sectors.

industry_code.description: Standard industry classification code (NAICS or SIC)

analysis_date.description: Date for which to perform the analysis

include_economic_indicators.description: Whether to include economic indicators in analysis

error_messages: Invalid industry_code: Industry code not found in standard classification systems.
Invalid geographic_region: Region must be a valid geographic identifier.
Invalid analysis_date: Date must be in valid date-time format and not in the future.
Data unavailable: Industry risk data not available for the specified combination of industry and region.
usage: Provide industry_code, geographic_region, and analysis_date. Optionally include economic indicators. The tool returns comprehensive industry risk assessment with various risk factors and trends.

industry_risk_score.description: Overall industry risk score on 0-100 scale

market_volatility.description: Market volatility assessment: Low, Medium, or High

economic_trend.description: Economic trend direction: Growing, Stable, or Declining

regulatory_risk.description: Regulatory risk level: Low, Medium, or High

competitive_pressure.description: Competitive pressure assessment: Low, Medium, or High
